description:
Made in less than 72 hours for the GDL game jam
Theme: Bossfight

Controls:
Left/right to move
Space to attack

Music
made by the great Kevin MacLeod!
Listen to mor eof his stuff here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wx2FDyvt0gI

I am currently making one game per week!
Follow me on twitter to stay updated: https://twitter.com/wombatstuff
